New Records: Nishan Velupillay became the first Aussie of Sri Lankan descent to represent the Socceroos.
Key Match Events: Velupillay scored on his international debut.
Craig Goodwin was named player of the match.
Velupillay scored the final goal in stoppage time.
Post-Match Reflections: Joe Gauci expressed happiness over the record crowd and described the match as a positive step.
Craig Goodwin reflected on the team's performance and life under coach Tony Popovic.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tony Popovic's first match in charge resulted in a win.
The match had a record crowd turnout in South Australia.
